EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2016-06-15-Turbofest Chicago.EMAIL-Registered Reminder Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Tomorrow! Turbofest Chicago
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
We're very excited to have you join us tomorrow for VMTurbo's Turbofest Chicago <[[http://vmturbo.com/turbofest-chicago/]]> event beginning Wednesday, June 15th at 1:00 PM at OFFSITE Chicago <[[http://chicago.gooffsite.com/]]>, 560 W. Washington Blvd, Chicago, IL 60661. Final details for the event are listed below.
#VMTurbofest Details Wednesday June, 15, 2016 OFFSITE Chicago 560 W. Washington Blvd, Chicago, IL 60661
- From 8:00AM to 12:00PM at OFFSITE Chicago, Mezzanine Room, we are hosting meetings with our executives. If you would like to schedule a meeting, please contact Kelsey Hill, Kelsey.hill@vmturbo.com <[[mailto:kelsey.hill@vmturbo.com]]> - Turbofest will begin at 1:00PM with registration and refreshments at OFFSITE Chicago, 560 W. Washington Blvd, Chicago, IL. Registration begins at noon and the meeting itself will kick off promptly at 1:00PM - Presentations will continue throughout the afternoon, wrapping up at 5:00PM with cocktails and refreshments to follow. - Tickets to the Tigers vs. White Sox game will be distributed at OFFSITE during cocktail hour. An announcement will be made as a reminder. You must obtain a ticket to the game before boarding the busses and keep this ticket with you for the entirety of the game. Busses to U.S. Cellular Field will leave at 6:30PM and will be waiting outside of OFFSITE Chicago. - Bag sizes 16”x16”x8” or smaller are permitted in the ballpark, just need to be checked by security. You can find a list of prohibited items here <[[http://mlb.mlb.com/cws/ballpark/information/index.jsp?content=codeofconduct]]>. Please plan accordingly. - Food and beverages will be supplied throughout the evening at U.S. Cellular Field and busses will bring everyone back to OFFSITE Chicago after the game ends.
Please do not hesitate to reach out to us with any and all questions; our contact information can be found below. We look forward to seeing you in Chicago!
Sincerely,
Jillian Fiumara Event Manager, VMTurbo Cell: 860.305.1239
Kelsey Hill Executive Assistant, VMTurbo Cell: 914.330.4210
